column4: sorry what does libvideo0 do?  doesn't sound like a proper ppa or package
Zeroedout, on irc?
err zeroxnak on irc?
O_o
so, i've been trying since 3pm EST.... anyone have experience with Ubuntu as a client, PPTP VPNs and split tunnelling? lol
sorry, but WTF is global jam?
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGlobalJam
I was about to mail my local LUG to propose to cooperate on doing such an event
so do so
so if they aren't, spread the word yourself.... you don't need a date to introduce others, do you?
actually... I do :P I don't have much self-confidence
what is worrying?  what does self confidence have to do with introducing others to OSS and Ubuntu?
I mean that it's worryng the lack of awareness for it
I've been using Linux since the early 90s.... Linux will find it's place.... users will find Linux - what is your concern that there is no awareness?  I don't understand?
feedback on what?  so there is no global jam.... no one takes interest..... do you take interest?
I do... and I'm prodding others to gauge the interest... now I'll drop by ubuntu+1... and next I'll try some mails
don't convert.... educate, use the tool for the job... this isn't a religion, it's an OS
I never used the word "convert"... did I gave the impression of being somewhat zealotic? :)
i think I like linux and Ubuntu and it serves a place in my life.... i choose to help people with it.... if they choose to use Windows or Mac, that's their choice
these aren't the droids you're looking for...
that is
